name: Prototype: Munch
description:
Protoype: Munch is an experiment with second-person camera and controls. The game is played from the perspective of an NPC that follows around a teddy bear you control. Navigate through the maze, and make it to the goal!

Created for #OneGameAMonth during August.

Controls: press the arrow keys or WASD to move the teddy bear. Press Esc to restart the game.

This game is made possible by Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/OmiyaGames
